pageProduct.name: Swisse Polypeptide Renewing Sleep Mask 50g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SWISSE POLYPEPTIDE RENEWING SLEEP MASK plumps, smooths and softens dry skin by intensely hydrating overnight. The Age-Defying Active Botanical Complex and Polypeptides helps improve the appearance of tired, stressed skin, to deliver a more youthful & healthier looking skin, while feeling strengthened and moisturised.

Warnings

Storage:
Store below 28°C.
Warnings:
This product contains essential oils. Test before use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner.

Common Uses

TARGETS PRE-MATURE AGING/ALL SKIN TYPES

Directions

Apply to clean, dry skin and leave on overnight. Do not rinse. For added benefit apply following the Swisse Bio-Retinol Renewing Night Cream. Recommended for use 1-2 times a week, or anytime your skin is looking a bit tired and needing of plumping and smoothing.
